title: CUE Audio Light Show Enablement
custom_preconds:
iOS [BP-10912](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10912 )
Android [BPA-7601](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7601 )

GIVEN the user installed a version of the Ballpark app supported for CUE (iOS:13.2.3 / Android:13.7.0)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has navigated to team tab w/ CTA to Cue experience

-------------------

Currently there is a remote config parameter [cue_audio_urls](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config/env/firebase?query=cue_audio_urls ) that contains a list of URLs that will open up the custom Cue Audio web view. [Tentative plan, the configuration on enablement may change prior to club usage - i.e possible ClubTools flag]
custom_steps:
To Test:
* BP-App: In Staging only navigate to Miami Marlins → Staging Only → Cue Audio Testing and open up the Webview. The screen will remain blank until the light show is started.
* on Computer: 
Start an example own light show by navigating to the Cue Audio panel [https://mlb-test.cuelive.com/admin/#/home/light-show](https://mlb-test.cuelive.com/admin/#/home/light-show )
**username: mlb-test
**password: 25sloPsxyt

OR [CUE Audio - Light Show > ADMIN LOGINS:](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1U9577S8nsURGkOzmkxwf0bnGp8Rs7gKZO04TxkOfIsE/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.453a9v8r2rpj )

Click on Timeline and look for a play button to start the light show. (Make sure it was started from the beginning)
custom_expected: Notice that your camera light on your device(BPapp) syncs up with the show.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN BPapp user triggers CTA to Cue experience 

(*STG env: Navigate to Miami Marlins → Staging Only → Cue Audio Testing)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the screen within internal webview will remain blank until the light show is started.

*if not prev enabled, Camera Permission prompt may be shown
**iOS: "Ballpark" Would Like to Access the Camera - Ballpark uses the camera to capture photos and videos. CTA - Don't Allow | Allow


**Android: "Allow BP Staging Debug to take pictures and record video? 
CTA 
While using the app 
Only this time 
Don't allow 

Note: Android prompt could be vary based on OS

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN Cue operator enables the show 

(*on Computer: Start an example own light show by navigating to the Cue Audio panel [https://mlb-test.cuelive.com/admin/#/home/light-show](https://mlb-test.cuelive.com/admin/#/home/light-show )
**username: mlb-test
**password: 25sloPsxyt
OR [CUE Audio - Light Show > ADMIN LOGINS:](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1U9577S8nsURGkOzmkxwf0bnGp8Rs7gKZO04TxkOfIsE/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.453a9v8r2rpj )


Click on Timeline and look for a play button to start the light show.)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Light show has been enabled
AND BPApp user should notice their camera light(off/on) on their device syncs up with the show.

title: CUE Audio Light Show Enablement - Permission Denied
custom_preconds:
iOS [BP-10912](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10912 )
Android [BPA-7601](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7601 )

GIVEN the user installed a version of the Ballpark app supported for CUE (iOS:13.2.3 / Android:13.7.0)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has navigated to team tab w/ CTA to Cue experience

-------------------

Currently there is a remote config parameter [cue_audio_urls](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config/env/firebase?query=cue_audio_urls ) that contains a list of URLs that will open up the custom Cue Audio web view. [Tentative plan, the configuration on enablement may change prior to club usage - i.e possible ClubTools flag]
custom_steps:
To Test:
* BP-App: In Staging only navigate to Miami Marlins → Staging Only → Cue Audio Testing and open up the Webview. The screen will remain blank until the light show is started.
* on Computer: 
Start an example own light show by navigating to the Cue Audio panel [https://mlb-test.cuelive.com/admin/#/home/light-show](https://mlb-test.cuelive.com/admin/#/home/light-show )
**username: mlb-test
**password: 25sloPsxyt
Click on Timeline and look for a play button to start the light show. (Make sure it was started from the beginning)
custom_expected: Notice that your camera light on your device(BPapp) syncs up with the show.

custom_steps_separated.content:
(may be best to perform a fresh install, to ensure permission prompt shown)
WHEN BPapp user triggers CTA to Cue experience 

(*STG env: Navigate to Miami Marlins → Staging Only → Cue Audio Testing)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Camera Permission prompt is shown 
**iOS: "Ballpark" Would Like to Access the Camera - Ballpark uses the camera to capture photos and videos. CTA - Don't Allow | Allow

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN BPapp user denies permission (via 'Don't Allow' CTA)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the screen within internal webview will show blank

(user can be shown webview page contents/graphics after the light show is started. Camera Access to Light should NOT be blinking)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN Cue operator enables the show 

(*on Computer: Start an example own light show by navigating to the Cue Audio panel [https://mlb-test.cuelive.com/admin/#/home/light-show](https://mlb-test.cuelive.com/admin/#/home/light-show )
**username: mlb-test
**password: 25sloPsxyt
Click on Timeline and look for a play button to start the light show.)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Light show has been enabled
AND BPApp user should notice their camera light(off/on) on their device NOT syncing up with the show.

title: CUE Audio Light Show Enablement - DataTier 2
custom_preconds:
iOS [BP-10962](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10962 )
Android [BPA-7601](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7601 )

GIVEN the user installed a version of the Ballpark app supported for CUE (iOS:13.2.3 / Android:13.7.0)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has navigated to team tab w/ CTA to Cue experience

-------------------

Currently there is a remote config parameter [cue_audio_urls](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config/env/firebase?query=cue_audio_urls ) that contains a list of URLs that will open up the custom Cue Audio web view. [Tentative plan, the configuration on enablement may change prior to club usage - i.e possible ClubTools flag]
custom_steps: Connect mobile device to proxy and access the desired CUE link w/in Team Page
custom_expected:
Notice that expected header information is being passed wrt
*OKTA - Unique user identifier

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN BPapp user triggers CTA to Cue experience 

(*STG env: Navigate to Miami Marlins → Staging Only → Cue Audio Testing)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the screen within internal webview will remain blank until the light show is started.

*if not prev enabled, Camera Permission prompt may be shown
**iOS: "Ballpark" Would Like to Access the Camera - Ballpark uses the camera to capture photos and videos. CTA - Don't Allow | Allow

THEN proxy is shown with what is passed into the Request Headers

for dataTier=2:
AND x-mlbam-okta should show the value of the OKTA string for the user
AND Referer should show value of 'ballpark::/webview


*x-mlbam-okta => Unique user identifier, persistent across devices and sessions.

title: [WIP] CUE Audio Light Show Enablement - Checked In Status
custom_preconds:
iOS [BP-10962](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10962 )
Android [BPA-7601](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7601 )

GIVEN the user installed a version of the Ballpark app supported for CUE (iOS:13.2.3 / Android:13.7.0)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has navigated to team tab w/ CTA to Cue experience

-------------------

*To enable a CTA on TeamPage just for checked-in fans -  the 'Checked-in Only' flag in ClubTools configuration needs to be set to true (ensure published to STG, if making change)
custom_steps:
To Test:
* BP-App: STG Env; (Landing Page) Miami Marlins team page (scroll to bottom)→ Cue Audio Testing Only → Cue Audio Testing 
* on Computer: 
Start an example own light show by navigating to the Cue Audio panel [https://mlb-test.cuelive.com/admin/#/home/light-show](https://mlb-test.cuelive.com/admin/#/home/light-show )
**username: mlb-test
**password: 25sloPsxyt
Click on Timeline and look for a play button to start the light show. (Make sure it was started from the beginning)
custom_expected:
WHEN user is NOT checked-in to the event - THEN user should be prevented from the CUE experience

WHEN user is checked-in to the event - THEN user should be allowed to enter/view the CUE experience

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user is NOT checked-in to the event
WHEN user navigates to CTA to view Cue Experience

(*STG env: Navigate to Miami Marlins → Cue Audio Testing)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is presented a prompt "Check-in Required - The content you selected is available upon event check-in." w/ OK cta

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user enables their location (via HomeTab CTA) while at venue (auto checkin)
AND user navigates to CTA to view Cue Experience

(*STG env: Navigate to Miami Marlins → Cue Audio Testing)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is NOT shown 'Check-in Required' prompt

NOTE: Current Bug [BP-10979](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10979 ) exists for iOS -- where user currently needs to restart BPapp in order to no longer show the Check-in prompt

AND the screen within internal webview will remain blank until the light show is started.

*if not prev enabled, Camera Permission prompt may be shown
**iOS: "Ballpark" Would Like to Access the Camera - Ballpark uses the camera to capture photos and videos. CTA - Don't Allow | Allow

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN Cue operator enables the show 

(*on Computer: Start an example own light show by navigating to the Cue Audio panel [https://mlb-test.cuelive.com/admin/#/home/light-show](https://mlb-test.cuelive.com/admin/#/home/light-show )
**username: mlb-test
**password: 25sloPsxyt
Click on Timeline and look for a play button to start the light show.)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Light show has been enabled
AND BPApp user should notice their camera light(off/on) on their device syncs up with the show.
